issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Create "merge" execution plan
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The MergeExec plan simply executes multiple partitions in parallel and combines the result into a single partition.
